title: Aaru Adi Veedu Lyrics Goli Soda Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Aaru Adi Veedu
Singer: Gana Bala
Music: SN Arunagiri
Lyrics: Gaana Bala

Aaru Adi Veedu, adhan peru sudugaadu
anga pona thirumbivara mudiyadhu
konjam naalaana irukkumidam theriyadhu
anga pona thirumbivara mudiyadhu
konjam naalaana irukkumidam theriyadhu
aaru adi veedu ...

Aadaadha aattamellaam aadi varum namakku
aaru adi mannuthaandaa nirandharam ingu unakku (2)

andha aaruadiyum nirandhamilla
boomiyiley namakku.
Unmela oruvan padukka varuvaan
pottu paaru kanakku.

pottu paaru kanakku.
